leftring.name: Band of Zu
leftring.description: The Power of the Zarath flows through this mithril band.

rightring.name: Golden Buniyar Band
rightring.description: All marvel at the Grace and Speed of the Grand Buniyar.

affixes.name: resilience
affixes.description: Chance to recover a percentage of missing health on being hit.

items.name: Stone of Return
items.description: A mystical stone that returns you to the surface of Zurath.

items.name: Shard of Echoes
items.description: A fragment pulsing with ancient whispers, guiding you to the Echoes.

items.name: Band of Karn
items.description: The Power of the Khetar flows through this steel band.

paths.title: Whispers of Zukarath
paths.description: Follow the guidance of the Zukran Masters to prove your worth.
paths.activeText: Continue your trials with the Zukran Masters to prove your worth.
paths.completionText: You have completed the Journey of Whispers, you are now a full member of the Zukaran Order of Magi!

paths.title: Echoes of Zurath
paths.description: Uncover the hidden Echoes within Zurath.

paths.title: Enter Ashangal
paths.description: Seek out echos that may help you discover the entrance to the endless depths of Ashangal.
paths.completionText: You have found the entrance to Ashangal.

tasks.title: Prepare for Ashangal
tasks.description: Speak to Sehnrhyx Syliri when you are ready to enter Ashangal.
tasks.completionText: You are ready to enter Ashangal.

tasks.title: Reach the Depths
tasks.description: Locate the secret entrance on Tier 10.

tasks.title: Return to Syliri
tasks.description: Use your Stone of Return to return to Sehnrhyx Syliri.
tasks.completionText: You have returned to Sehnrhyx Syliri.
